summary: Frontend-only testing completed for OphtaGestion ophthalmology cabinet management app. Modern KEAP-inspired design verified, login functionality working, responsive design validated across desktop/tablet/mobile. Fixed critical BACKEND_URL configuration issue.
critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: Frontend was using hardcoded external Render.com URL (ope-francis.onrender.com) instead of REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL environment variable. Changed to use process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: App is an ophthalmology cabinet management system with planning, leaves management, personnel management. Login works with directeur@cabinet.fr/admin123. Modern KEAP-style design with cyan/turquoise gradient (#0091B9 to #19CD91). All 12 navigation items tested: actualites, profil, personnel, planning, conges, demandes-travail, messages, documents, plan-cabinet, salles, stocks, admin.

login_page_design.details: Modern gradient background (cyan to turquoise), OphtaGestion branding with eye icon, clean login form, mobile responsive

login_functionality.details: Login with directeur@cabinet.fr/admin123 works correctly, redirects to dashboard with success toast

navbar_design.details: Modern navbar with OphtaGestion logo, eye icon, user avatar with role-based gradient colors, hamburger menu button

dropdown_menu.details: Modern dropdown menu with animation, icons, active state highlighting, all 12 navigation items present

responsive_design.details: Desktop (1920x1080), Tablet (768x1024), and Mobile (390x844) all working correctly. Left branding panel hidden on mobile/tablet as expected

overtime_calculation_code_review.details: getHeuresSupMois and getHeuresSupAnnee functions correctly implement: MALADIE and CONGE_SANS_SOLDE count as effective hours, HEURES_A_RECUPERER adds to overtime balance without counting as effective hours, HEURES_RECUPEREES subtracts from overtime balance without counting as effective hours

bugs_fixed_by_testing_agent.issue: BACKEND_URL was hardcoded to external Render.com URL instead of using REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL environment variable
bugs_fixed_by_testing_agent.severity: CRITICAL - prevented login from working in preview environment
